VARIABLES.name: x_A
VARIABLES.description: Number of orders from Supplier A

VARIABLES.name: x_B
VARIABLES.description: Number of orders from Supplier B

VARIABLES.name: x_C
VARIABLES.description: Number of orders from Supplier C

OBJECTIVE.query: The specific part of extracted_queries used for objective

CONSTRAINTS.description: The restaurant must order at least 7 times from Supplier A or B or C.
The restaurant needs to order at least 150 tables.
The restaurant needs to order no more than 600 tables.
If the restaurant decides to order tables from Supplier A, it must also order at least 30 tables from Supplier B.
If the restaurant decides to order tables from Supplier B, it must also order tables from Supplier C.
If the restaurant decides to order tables from Supplier A, the sum of tables supplied from Suppler A and B is at least 25.
If the restaurant decides to order tables from Supplier B, the sum of tables supplied from Supplier B and C is at least 30.
The total tables supplied from Supplier A can not exceed 60.
